Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 17th overall pick, by Texas in 1983...
Injured on 6/9/1985 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 2-3 weeks...
Traded from Texas to St. Louis on 6/23/1985 (Going to STL: P D. Cone, P M. Williams. Going to TEX: P D. Eckersley)...
Earned first career win on 4/11/1988...
Injured on 7/9/1988 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Won World Series with St. Louis in 1993...
